title: So not sure if this is a bug

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Every time i log in i see this, i go to my account purchases and don't see anything added to my account, im not gaining rp or ip from it either..

and rioters wanna explain/confirm this is a bug?

replies.body: Most likely those are leftover notifications from when those events did happen. It can happen sometimes if the notification is never officially "read" so let's try clicking on the little bell icon next to your name and then dismissing any messages in that window. Hit me back up if it keeps happening after that though!
cheers for the fix, ive been seeing that pop-up for a long time and never realized i had to clear the notifications like that
